DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate effect physical training patient type 2 diabetes treatment GLP-1 receptor agonist liraglutide ( Victoza® ) 16-weeks double-blinded , randomized placebo-controlled clinical trial . Hypothesis : Physical training lead good metabolic control type 2 diabetic patient train combine liraglutide ( Victoza® ) treatment .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Physical Training GLP-1 Receptor Agonist Liraglutide Treatment Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Informed oral write consent Diagnosed type 2 diabetes accord criterion WHO HbA1C : 711 % ( treatment diet and/or metformin ) Age > 18 year BMI > 25 kg/m2 < 40 kg/m2 Negative islet cell antibody ( ICA ) glutamate decarboxylase 65 ( GAD 65 ) autoantibody Females child bear potential pregnant , breastfeed intention become pregnant use adequate contraceptive measure . Subjects treat sulfonylurea , dipeptidyl peptidase 4 ( DPP4 ) inhibitor , insulin glitazones Ongoing abuse alcohol narcotic Impaired hepatic function ( liver transaminase > 2 time upper normal limit ) Impaired renal function ( secreatinine > 150μM and/or albuminuria ) Cardiac problem define decompensated heart failure ( NYHA class III IV ) , unstable angina pectoris and/or myocardial infarction within last 12 month Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 180 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg ) Anaemia Any condition investigator feel would interfere trial participation Receiving investigational drug within last 3 month
